Astronomers collect data for several moons in orbit around a distant planet. The data collected are the distance between the planet and each moon and the period of the circular orbit of each moon around the planet. The data are shown in the table.
content.question: The data for moon <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> are used to calculate the mass of the distant planet. The mass of the planet is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
